name: mirrorlight
0:
”Alexa, open mirror light”
”Alexa, begin mirror light”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mirror light
des:
This skill can control the light strip and screen control of BOER's smart mirror (built-in Android system). 

Note: 
(1) Just have an Amazon account.
(2) The skill can also be used on other devices with Alexa voice function.Although there will be a correct response, it will not change the status of any device.

For the first use, you can say "Alexa, enable mirror light". Or click "Enable" on the skill detail page to enable the skill.

Steps for usage:
(1) Enter skills:
 Alexa, open mirror light

(2) Commands that can be said:
 (2-1) Light strip control (you can say any of the following commands):
 ① 'Turn on the light'
 ② 'Turn off the light'
 ③ 'Light brighten'
 ④ 'Light dim'
 ⑤ 'Brightest'
 ⑥ 'Darkest'

 (2-2) Screen control:
 ① 'screen off'

(3) Exit the current skill (you can say any of the following commands):
 ① 'stop'
 ② 'bye'
 ③ 'goodbye'
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
